title: Andrew Liveris
itunes:title: Andrew Liveris
description:
Andrew Liveris, Lucid Group Chairman, talks about the competitive market for EVs and the need for more infrastructure investing in the US. He's on "The David Rubenstein Show: Peer-to-Peer Conversations." This was recorded on August 8 in New York. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
